n: Festive Fresh Blueberry and Cranberry Relish
des: "Holiday must. Super easy to prepare, 5 ingredient Fresh Blueberry Cranberry Relish.   Everyone loves the blueberry twist and its beautiful on the table too. Make extra for leftovers and to put in beautiful jars as a holiday gift.  Thankfully blueberries are readily available all winter long."
ins: Heat cranberries, blueberries, orange juice, sugar, orange zest, and vanilla in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir until the sugar dissolves and berries soften, about 15 minutes. Cover and chill until ready to serve.
